# Fob

![Actions CI](https://github.com/NFIBrokerage/fob/workflows/Actions%20CI/badge.svg)

A keyset pagination library for Ecto queries

## Installation

```elixir
def deps do
  [
    {:fob, "~> 1.0", organization: "cuatro"}
  ]
end
```

Check out the docs here: https://cuatro.hexdocs.pm/fob
